i make and me by waiting tables.

participant_2.background:
I have no siblings, but I love spending time with my friends and family at our cabin in the woods on the lake.
Social media is not my thing.
i write childrens books.
i have a cat named felix and a small terrer names emmy.
i have more money than i know what to do with.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just working on my latest children's book.
That's so cool! Are you self published or do you work with a publisher?
I work with a publisher. I love the process of seeing my book come to life.
I bet it's so rewarding! I'm not too creative, but I do love to play video games.
Oh, what kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play action games and explore the different worlds. I also love the thrill of a good challenge.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a gamer myself, but I do enjoy watching my friends play.
It's definitely a fun hobby. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. We have a cabin in the woods that we go to on the weekends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of an outdoorsy person, but I can appreciate the beauty of nature.
I'm glad you think so! I love spending time in nature, it's so peaceful and relaxing.
I'm sure it is! Maybe I'll try to get out more this summer.
That would be great! It's a great way to de-stress and relax.
Thanks for the suggestion! I'll definitely try it out
